entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
